shortDescription.intro: Replaces missing values with the next encountered non-missing value.

fullDescription.p:
This missing value handler replaces missing values with the linear interpolation between the last encountered and next non-missing value. The column 1 2 ? ? 5 6, for example, would be interpolated to 1 2 3 4 5 6.
This missing value handler does not produce standard PMML 4.2!
